content: 12 days of shawl-mas christmas is a season that knitters are often furiously clicking their needles to finish gifts for other people how often do knitters take time to enjoy the season and knit themselves a special item this year our gift to you is this mkal 12 day knit experience each day for 12 days a new clue will be revealed one skein of yarn a set of circular needles and a couple of hours each day will get it done project materials yarn fingering weight/sock yarn approx 420 yards or you can use up scraps and we will note the potential colour change row g auge 32 st/4 needles circular needles 40-60cm s ize is 3 25mm -
